text: Lydia in about 50CE. Bonitai or Boneita was a town of ancient Lydia, near Ephesus, inhabited during Roman times. Its site is located near Küçükkale in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Lydia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of İzmir Province
title: Bonitai
